name: Phantom Runner (Nayu)
description:
Phantom Runner is a small "Platformer" game, where you play the phantom who is trying to save his planet. To successfully save your planet you need to reactivate the Cores of the world again.

 

 

Controles

Move

Keyboard - "A" "D"

Gamepad- "Left Stick"

Jump

Keyboard- "Spacebar"

Gamepad- "South Button"

Dash

Keyboard- "Shift"

Gamepad- "Right Trigger"

Swing

Keyboard- "STRG"

Gamepad- "Right Shoulder"
